item.description:
Rokia Traoré
From Mali
Friday, April 16, 8:00 PM

Somerville Theatre
55 Davis Square
Somerville, 02145
Reserved seating
$35.00 (includes Somerville Theatre $1.00 restoration fee)


Celebrated internationally for her energetic live performances, Rokia Traoré and her band create an intimate new contemporary sound that is profoundly African. With subtle, bluesy guitar playing and captivating voice, she spellbinds one moment with a haunting ballad and then rocks the house with high-energy Afro-pop the next.

Free preperformance talk with Rokia Traoré from 6pm-6:45p


http://www.worldmusic...
item.name: Rokia Traore April 16
